Residential miscellaneous electric loads inputs
Last Modified: October 12, 2016
Definition:    Miscellaneous electric loads (MELs) inputs
Units:         Indices, 2009=1
Source:        RECS 2009
               Navigant contract report
               TIAX contract report
               Various DOE rulemakings Technical Support Documents and ENERGY STAR product specifications
Comments:      This file includes groups of saturation and per-unit energy consumption (UEC) indicies, respectively, for miscellaneous electric loads.
               The columns are years 2010-2050, while the rows are in order of the end uses listed at the bottom.
               First five uses are TV-related, next four are PC-related, then the rest are reported as among "electric other".
